description.value:
As a swift action, you can cause an enemy to take 1d6 points of nonlethal damage if you dealt damage to that enemy with a spell since the start of your previous turn. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Charisma modifier.

This damage increases to 2d6 at 8th level and to 3d6 at 15th level.
